  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Corner()
    Dummy constructor of the class, initializes a generic corner with dummy values

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    cover()
    Method that sets false to the flag 'visible' meaning that the corner is covered by another card, and it's not visible anymore
    Item
    getItem()
    Method that returns the item in the corner
    Resource
    getResource()
    Method that returns the resource in the corner
    CornerType
    getType()
    Method that returns the corner's type
    boolean
    isVisible()
    Method that tells if a corner is visibile
    void
    uncover()
    Method that sets true to the flag 'visible' meaning that the corner is not covered by another card anymore, and it's now visible

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Corner

      public Corner()
      Dummy constructor of the class, initializes a generic corner with dummy values

    • Corner

      public Corner(CornerType type, Resource resource, Item item)
      Constructor of the class, initializes the corner. It initializes Corner with the given parameters, also setting 'visible' to true
      Parameters:
      type - The corner's type
      resource - The type of resource in the corner
      item - The type of item in the corner

      Method that returns the corner's type

      Method that returns the resource in the corner

    • getItem

      public Item getItem()
      Method that returns the item in the corner
      Returns:
      the item in the corner

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible()
      Method that tells if a corner is visibile
      Returns:
      the boolean 'visible', true if the corner is visible, otherwise false

    • cover

      public void cover()
      Method that sets false to the flag 'visible' meaning that the corner is covered by another card, and it's not visible anymore

    • uncover

      public void uncover()
      Method that sets true to the flag 'visible' meaning that the corner is not covered by another card anymore, and it's now visible
